website_summaries.verdict: Offers a more vintage twist for a door mirror. Perfect if you want an extra accent in your bedroom or closet with the added benefit of a practical mirror.
pros: An extremely secure fit around any style and thickness of door
Great dimensions for viewing oneself when getting ready for the day or a special occasion
cons: Installation requires a little bit of extra time compared to other options

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and as expected, quality fits price, slight distortion in reflection
customer_reviews.text: Colors are as pictured, looks great to complement my "oil rubbed bronze" finishes. I hung on wall and it's decent mirror but it's of quality you'd expect at this price. There is some slight distortion but it's a "thinning" distortion just a little bit toward the bottom of mirror so it doesn't bother me (actually a little helpful on a rough morning to look a little thinner!). I'd recommend for typical bathroom/bedroom use but it isn't a "high end" mirror so know what you're buying.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Below even Wal-Mart's standards
customer_reviews.text: If I were you I would save my money. This mirror is junk. The mirror isnt even glass its that reflective material in toddler's tools. The 2 mounting hangers they sent we completely different. One white the other black, one was bigger than the other and the holes were in different spots.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Bane

customer_reviews.title: I promise you the hooks to hang the mirror on the door will bend because it's like they are made out of tin foil
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made! The hooks that are included bent when I tried to install them on the mirror! I promise you the hooks to hang the mirror on the door will bend because it's like they are made out of tin foil. The metal they used is that soft. Plus, the mirror will bang the door every time you open or close it. So I suggest that you put it on a door you don't open that often. I'm keeping it b/c it's going in a guest bedroom and hopefully I won't have to hear the rattle against the door....just my guests will :-)
customer_reviews.author: LMW

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. The miter joints on this mirror like they were done by a six-year-old. There is a large gap and every one of them. Mirror also came with scratches on the frame as well a chip and the upper right hand corner of the frame. And if that's not bad enough, the mirror itself distorts the image.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond R.

customer_reviews.title: Lovely mirror
customer_reviews.text: This is a lovely mirror. The hangers are wide enough to fit on a variety of door thicknesses, but still don't prevent a snugly fitting door from latching. I love the frame on the mirror; it makes a nice decorative accent that is neutral enough to work with a lot of color schemes in your home.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Goodman

customer_reviews.title: very pretty, but...
customer_reviews.text: This item is very pretty, but unfortunately I've had to return it three times! It arrived broken three times and so unfortunately I give up now. Such a shame as I really wanted it.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Mirror looks great; frame is beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Mirror looks great; frame is beautiful; however, the pre-assembled metal hooks were crooked so we had to bend and manipulate the hanger attachments in order for it to hang evenly.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Not intended for wall hanging
customer_reviews.text: This is a very beautiful mirror however whoever installed the wall hook on the back did not know how to measure halfway. If I had hung it on the wall as I intended, it would have hung crooked. So I am sending it back because I do not have the necessary means to correct this stupid mistake. This mirror is from China.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great mirror. For its price and style it is an awesome addition to any door in a bedroom, bathroom, or walk in. I love the brown and gold finish and patterns on it.
customer_reviews.author: Verified Consumer

customer_reviews.title: NICE MIRROR
customer_reviews.text: This is a very pretty piece. We bought this to put on the wall in my mother's room so she could have a full view mirror. It works very well that way. I would definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy L Holstrom-Bird

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous mirror
customer_reviews.text: Really nice mirror. A little long to arrive but worth the wait at an extraordinary price.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn H.

customer_reviews.title: Classy mirror
customer_reviews.text: The mirror is classy and stylish without being too flashy. Good quality and love that it easily fits over the door with very little set up.
customer_reviews.author: MarLo

customer_reviews.title: Great mirror but the hanging pieces are misaligned.
customer_reviews.text: Great mirror but the hanging pieces are misaligned. I had to remove the mirror, drill new holes and remount one of the pieces of hardware on the back to get it to sit straight.
customer_reviews.author: R. Shah

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: To expensive for the way you look on it, not a real mirror
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seller should update their overall size description. They are ...
customer_reviews.text: Seller should update their overall size description. They are 17" x 53". I will end up making them work for what I need them for, but I specifically bought them because it stated they are 18" wide.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great for the price, much better than I thought it would be. looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen H.

customer_reviews.title: Looks better in the picture
customer_reviews.text: It looks a little cheaper in person, but it works fine and was easy to hang.
customer_reviews.author: YoAdrienne

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks good! A little more bronze than brown or black, but it's fine.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Fleming

customer_reviews.title: Significantly bowed
customer_reviews.text: I would love this mirror if it was straight. It's significantly bowed in the center so the top and bottom are not flush with the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Neil and Jess

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in perfect condition. Would be nice to have a way ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in perfect condition. Would be nice to have a way to fasten the bottom so doesn't rattle on a door that is used a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Great mirror for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great mirror. I think someone said something in the reviews about it being like a plastic mirror... it's not at all. It's perfect. Of course the materials aren't what you might expect if you spent a few hundred dollars, but for this price, it's a great mirror. Just what i needed.
customer_reviews.author: James Powell

customer_reviews.title: This is a REAL mirror - perfect for over the door
customer_reviews.text: Finally arrived after travelling across the country twice!! For all of those in the previous reviews, this is a REAL mirror. It hangs and balances safely and nicely over the door. Great for apartments without full length mirrors. Glad to have one back.
customer_reviews.author: StillReadsBooks

customer_reviews.title: I love how nice this looks and how easy it was ...
customer_reviews.text: I love how nice this looks and how easy it was to put the bars to hang it over the door.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: nice touch going out
customer_reviews.text: Really like put it on my door to go out in apartments (have a gap) so it fits just right and like the gold trim
customer_reviews.author: rilley

customer_reviews.title: Great look for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly behind my bedroom door and looks great with my decor!
customer_reviews.author: joni180

customer_reviews.title: The first shipping has chipped on the frame.  The second is good!
customer_reviews.text: The first shipping has chipped on the frame. The second is good!
customer_reviews.author: Dan Q Yang

product_meta.title: MCS 12x48 Inch Over The Door Two Toned Mirror, 18x54 Inch Overall Size, Bronze (47705), 18 by 54-Inch
product_meta.description: The MCS 12 inch by 48 inch deluxe series of over -the -door mirrors are framed with classic moldings with foil finishes. The overall size of the mirror measures 18 inches by 54 inches and can be hung easily over most any door without additional hardware or fasteners. The mirror itself is 12 inches wide by 48 inches long. The set of over- the -door white hooks (included) can be adjusted to different lengths. Model 47705 has a 2. 75 Inch wide frame molding with a bronze look with champagne accents.
feature_bullets: The 2.75 inch wide frame has a bronze finish with brushed champagne edges
Four D-Ring hangers attached for vertical or horizontal wall hanging
Over-the door hanging height is adjustable
Patented no-tools hanging system allows you to hang the mirror over-the-door without using any tools

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars41 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
